tool_description: Validates vendor-submitted documents against government requirements, checking authenticity, completeness, and compliance with procurement standards.

verification_level.description: Verification intensity level: basic, standard, enhanced

check_expiration.description: Whether to verify document expiration dates

required_certifications.description: List of mandatory certifications for this vendor category

error_messages: Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist in the system.
Missing documents: Required document types are not available for verification.
Invalid verification level: Use one of [basic, standard, enhanced].
Document format error: Submitted documents are in unsupported formats or corrupted.
Expired documents: One or more critical documents have expired and require renewal.
usage: Provide registration_id and document_types to verify. Optionally specify verification_level, check_expiration, and required_certifications. Returns detailed verification results for each document.

verification_summary.description: Overall verification status and key findings

verified_documents.description: List of successfully verified document types

failed_documents.description: List of documents that failed verification
